title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5011.3 - Ticket sales
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5011.3 - Ticket sales

State Regulations
(a) No person
shall sell a Pick-10 ticket at a price greater than that fixed by the
commission. (b) The price of each
game panel for the Pick-10 game is $1. One-, two-, three-or four-game panels
may be played on each play card. (c) Bets may be placed either for the next
scheduled drawing or for up to seven consecutive drawings. No other bet
durations are available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5011.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
